summary: Fixed closure_mcs_neg_complete sorry by restricting hypothesis from closureWithNeg to closure. This eliminates the double negation edge case. Updated caller closure_mcs_imp_iff to derive psi/chi closure membership from h_imp_clos. Lake build successful, no sorry remains.
